content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #207

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 1

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: Overview
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Comment:
The specification does not include a list of VERSIONED references. This allows the specification to change when any of the refernces change which should not be allowed.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We agree that when references are used, the specific version of the reference should be stated.

Eg, will add footnotes for every reference to an external document (RFCs, JSON, etc). We will get help from Bas on this change.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #207

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #207

**Propposed Disposition:** Persuasive
**Disposition Comment:**
We agree that when references are used, the specific version of the reference should be stated.

Eg, will add footnotes for every reference to an external document (RFCs, JSON, etc). We will get help from Bas on this change.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #207

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
We agree that when references are used, the specific version of the reference should be stated.

Eg, will add footnotes for every reference to an external document (RFCs, JSON, etc). We will get help from Bas on this change.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

brettmarquard commented on Issue #207

@bvdh

We plan to make following updates -- are there others:
Add SMART on FHIR specification version (check on expected HL7 publication date and link)
Add STU3 version link for FHIR Resources: Practitioner, Patient, RelatedPerson, MedicationRequest.

brynrhodes commented on Issue #207

SMART-on-FHIR updates have been applied. RFC's are perma-links already. That leaves GFM, which from what I can see doesn't have a permalink, and JWT, which we should update to the RFC (or at least provide a footnote that does that.

However, I disagree that we should permalink the FHIR resources. We say specifically that CDS Hooks works with multiple versions of FHIR, and the only restriction is that all resources in a given response be from the same version. I think linking to the root url for the FHIR links is appropriate throughout.

kpshek commented on Issue #207

However, I disagree that we should permalink the FHIR resources. We say specifically that CDS Hooks works with multiple versions of FHIR, and the only restriction is that all resources in a given response be from the same version. I think linking to the root url for the FHIR links is appropriate throughout.

@brynrhodes - Agreed that we want to be clear that CDS Hooks works for multiple (intention is any) version of FHIR. But what if the linked resource/page is renamed in a future FHIR version thereby breaking our link in the specification?
